title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the GroupMentorshipOrganizer system, including user roles, group formation rules, communication channels, and reporting capabilities.

title: Design System Architecture
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including the components, their interactions, and the data flow. Consider scalability, security, performance requirements, and the following aspects: 

1. User Management: Mechanisms for user registration, authentication, and authorization.
2. Group Formation: Algorithms and criteria for forming mentorship groups based on factors like interests, skills, and goals.
3. Communication: Channels for group communication, such as chat, video conferencing, and file sharing.
4. Progress Tracking: Tools for tracking individual and group progress, setting goals, and providing feedback.
5. Reporting and Analytics: Mechanisms for generating reports and insights on group performance and engagement.
6. Integration: Potential integration with external services or platforms (e.g., learning management systems, video conferencing tools).
7. Data Storage: Strategies for storing and managing user data, group data, and other relevant information.
8. Deployment and Scaling: Considerations for deploying the system and scaling it as the user base grows.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to store user profiles, group information, communication logs, and other relevant data. The schema should be normalized, follow best practices for data integrity, and consider scalability and performance requirements.

title: Develop User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including role-based access control.

title: Develop Group Formation and Management
description: Implement the core functionality for forming and managing mentorship groups based on defined rules and user preferences.

title: Develop Communication and Collaboration Tools
description: Implement communication channels (e.g., chat, video conferencing) and collaboration tools (e.g., shared documents, whiteboards) for mentorship groups.

title: Develop Reporting and Analytics
description: Implement reporting and analytics capabilities to track group progress, participation, and mentorship effectiveness.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures such as data encryption, secure communication protocols, and vulnerability testing.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Plan and execute user acceptance testing to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and user expectations.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting instructions.
